qgisprocess 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Convert raster objects to/from QGIS inputs/outputs

Source: R/compat-raster.R
as_qgis_argument.RasterLayer.Rd

Convert raster objects to/from QGIS inputs/outputs

# S3 method for RasterLayer
as_qgis_argument(x, spec = qgis_argument_spec())

# S3 method for RasterBrick
as_qgis_argument(x, spec = qgis_argument_spec())

qgis_as_raster(output, ...)

qgis_as_brick(output, ...)

# S3 method for qgis_outputRaster
qgis_as_raster(output, ...)

# S3 method for qgis_outputRaster
qgis_as_brick(output, ...)

# S3 method for qgis_outputLayer
qgis_as_raster(output, ...)

# S3 method for qgis_outputLayer
qgis_as_brick(output, ...)

# S3 method for qgis_result
qgis_as_raster(output, ...)

# S3 method for qgis_result
qgis_as_brick(output, ...)

Arguments

x

A raster::raster() or raster::brick().
spec

A list() with values for algorithm, name, description, and qgis_type. See qgis_argument_spec() to create a blank spec for testing.
output

The result from qgis_run_algorithm() or qgis_output().
...

Passed to raster::raster() or raster::brick().
